data: OB AMB Outpatient Fetal Surveillance - Singleton
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
This PowerPlan is to be used when discharging patients from the Antepartum Unit
Diagnostic Tests
Singleton Tests: Once a Week Monitoring for 2 Weeks
Fetal Monitoring (NST) - Singleton
Within 1 Week, MFM Patient: Yes, MRSA Negative, for patient requiring Fetal Monitoring NST - Singleton 1x a week for 2 weeks. Do not book on weekends, Future Order, BCW Fetal Monitoring
